mapper.select: SELECT CO_NO, CO_BOARD_TYPE, CO_PARENT_NO, CO_DESCRIPTION, DATE_FORMAT(CO_CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS CO_CREATE_TIME, CO_USE_YN, ( SELECT Z.USER_NAME FROM JR_DB.EMP Z WHERE CO_AUTHOR = Z.USER_NO ) AS CO_AUTHOR, ( SELECT Z.USER_ID FROM JR_DB.EMP Z WHERE CO_AUTHOR = Z.USER_NO ) AS CO_USER_ID FROM JR_DB.COMMENTS WHERE CO_BOARD_TYPE = #{b_type} AND CO_PARENT_NO = #{p_no} AND CO_USE_YN = 1 ORDER BY CO_CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JR_DB.COMMENTS ( CO_BOARD_TYPE, CO_PARENT_NO, CO_DESCRIPTION, CO_CREATE_TIME, CO_AUTHOR ) VALUES ( #{CO_BOARD_TYPE}, #{CO_PARENT_NO}, #{CO_DESCRIPTION}, SYSDATE(), ${CO_AUTHOR} )
